name: A. Division
statement:
Oleg’s favorite subjects are History and Math, and his favorite branch
of mathematics is division.To improve his division skills, Oleg came up
with t pairs of integers p_i and q_i and for each pair decided to find
the integer x_i, such that: p_i is divisible by x_i; x_i is not
divisible by q_i. Oleg is really good at division and managed to find
all the answers quickly, how about you?
editorial:
Let . Letâs assume, that there exists prime , such that divides , but is
not divisible by . Then we can multiply and and the result will still
divide , but will not be divisible by . So for maximal there is no such
.Letâs assume, that there are two primes and , such that they both
divide , and both divide . Because is not divisible by , there exists
some prime ( can be equal to or ), such that number of occurrences of in
is less than number of occurrences of in . One of and is not equal to ,
so if we will multiply and such number, the result will not be divisible
by . So for maximal there are no such and .That means that (power of
some primal divisor of ). So to find maximal , we have to find all prime
divisors of (we have to factorise for it in time ) and for each of them
divide by it until result is not divisible by . That will be all our
candidates for greatest . We will do all of that in time .
